Research Master student at the University of Groningen.

Currently working on my MA thesis about #moderation on Mastodon. Are you an instance #moderator and willing to participate in a one-off, 45-60 minute-long (online) interview? Please @ me or reach out at k.k.matusewicz@student.rug.nl :)

Conducting research "with" Mastodon is a guiding principle of mine: I do not scrape data, and will always ask for informed consent before gathering/using any data.
